page.title: 08Eppleby Forcett C.E.SchoolJR
page.content: The school, which opened in{1906}with room for 106 children, replaced the old school, which we use as a{canteen} now. When it opened there were two playgrounds to separate the boys from the girls and infants. We now only have one{playground}with a block of {toilets}at each end. The school has stone{walls}and a slate{roof.}It has had storage{heaters}and strip{lighting put in. { Staff}There is a headteacher, an assistant teacher, a parttime teacher, a clerical assistant, a cook, a dinner helper and a caretaker. { Subjects}We do English, Mathematics, Reading, Geography, History, Science, Art, Scripture, Music and Cooking. PE is in the Village Hall or on the green School{starts}at 9 a.m. and{finishes} at 3.30 p.m. There are 32{children}(11 girls and 21 boys)
